00023  #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector.hpp>
00024  #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00025 #endif

00027 namespace viennacl

00031   // TAGS
00032   //
00033   struct tag_none     {};
00034   struct tag_ublas    {};
00035   struct tag_viennacl {};
00036 
00037   namespace traits
00038   {
00039     // ----------------------------------------------------
00040     // GENERIC BASE
00041     //
00051     template< typename T, typename Active = void >
00052     struct tag_of;
00053    
00054     template < typename Sequence, typename Active >
00055     struct tag_of
00056     {
00057       typedef viennacl::tag_none  type;
00058     };
00059     
00060     
00061     #ifdef VIENNACL_HAVE_UBLAS
00062     // ----------------------------------------------------
00063     // UBLAS
00064     //
00065     template< typename T >
00066     struct tag_of< boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T> >
00067     {
00068       typedef viennacl::tag_ublas  type;
00069     };
00070 
00071     template< typename T >
00072     struct tag_of< boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<T> >
00073     {
00074       typedef viennacl::tag_ublas  type;
00075     };
00076 
00077     template< typename T1, typename T2 >
00078     struct tag_of< boost::numeric::ublas::matrix_unary2<T1,T2> >
00079     {
00080       typedef viennacl::tag_ublas  type;
00081     };
00082 
00083     template< typename T1, typename T2 >
00084     struct tag_of< boost::numeric::ublas::compressed_matrix<T1,T2> >
00085     {
00086       typedef viennacl::tag_ublas  type;
00087     };
00088     
00089     #endif
00090     
00091     // ----------------------------------------------------
00092     // VIENNACL
00093     //
00094     template< typename T, unsigned int alignment >
00095     struct tag_of< viennacl::vector<T, alignment> >
00096     {
00097       typedef viennacl::tag_viennacl  type;
00098     };
00099 
00100     template< typename T, typename F, unsigned int alignment >
00101     struct tag_of< viennacl::matrix<T, F, alignment> >
00102     {
00103       typedef viennacl::tag_viennacl  type;
00104     };
00105 
00106     template< typename T1, typename T2, unsigned int I >
00107     struct tag_of< viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy<T1,T2,I> >
00108     {
00109       typedef viennacl::tag_viennacl  type;
00110     };
00111 
00112     template< typename T, unsigned int I>
00113     struct tag_of< viennacl::compressed_matrix<T,I> >
00114     {
00115       typedef viennacl::tag_viennacl  type;
00116     };
00117 
00118     template< typename T, unsigned int I>
00119     struct tag_of< viennacl::coordinate_matrix<T,I> >
00120     {
00121       typedef viennacl::tag_viennacl  type;
00122     };
00123     // ----------------------------------------------------
00124   } // end namespace traits

00130   template <typename Tag>
00131   struct is_ublas
00132   {
00133      enum { value = false };  
00134   };
00135 
00136   template <>
00137   struct is_ublas< viennacl::tag_ublas >
00138   {
00139      enum { value = true };  
00140   };
00141 
00146   template <typename Tag>
00147   struct is_viennacl
00148   {
00149      enum { value = false };  
00150   };
00151 
00152   template <>
00153   struct is_viennacl< viennacl::tag_viennacl >
00154   {
00155      enum { value = true };
